bill_title: authorize certain school district capital outlay fund transfers.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize certain school district capital outlay fund transfers. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 13-16-26 be amended to read as follows: 13-16-26. All or any part of a surplus of any school district fund, except the capital outlay fund provided by § § 13-16-6 to 13-16-9, inclusive, and the special education fund provided by § 13-37-16 may be transferred to any other school district fund. However, any unused portion of money that has been transferred into the special education fund may be transferred from the special education fund within the current fiscal year to the fund from which it originated. No transfer from the capital outlay fund established pursuant to § 13-16-6 to the general fund may exceed fifty percent of the capital outlay fund balance. Not more than one transfer from the capital outlay fund to the general fund may be made in any school fiscal year. All or any part of any school district fund may be loaned to any other school district fund for a term not to exceed twenty-four months. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
